title: Last Night on the Titanic: Doctors and Con Artists
description: The Titanic was filled with medical professionals either working as ship personnel or traveling in a non-professional capacity. There were also plenty of con artists aboard, hoping to worm their way into the wills of wealthy widows. Learn about their stories in this episode.
itunes:author: Scott Rank, PhD
